website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers D’Lites Biggest Fan is a comfortable and versatile shoe that can be used for various activities such as walking, errand running, working out, or as casual wear.The shoe’s trendy style and durability perfectly round up the shoe. However, it does come a bit narrow according to reviewers, which may hinder some buyers from purchasing it.
pros: A lot of testers have found the Skechers D’Lites Biggest Fan sneaker to be comfortable
The shoe is sturdy, according to many who purchased this footwear from Skechers’ D’Lites collection
Several buyers have reported that the low top Skechers footwear has good arch support
The shoe’s design has the thumbs up from a number of consumers who find the footwear’s old-school look stylish
The Skechers D’Lites biggest Fan is lightweight and perfect for walking or running errands, some customers have noted
A small portion of reviewers say they like the variety of choices in colors and call the color schemes as “pretty.”
One woman has written that the low top shoe is worth every penny spent
A buyer has commented that she loves the elevated heel of the D’Lites- Biggest Fan
cons: Several people have described the Skechers D’Lites - Biggest Fan shoe as too narrow
A few individuals have complained that they expect the Memory Foam insole to be thicker
One customer is unhappy that the low top shoe’s prettier colors are not available for the big sizes
This shoe by Skechers feels a little bit too low in the back, one tester has commented

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of which size to order as I am a size 7 . I ordered a size 7 and they fit perfectly. There's plenty room in them no more cramped feet. I have arthritis in my feet and a bunion and the shoe seems to mould to your shape. A very smart looking shoe with some nice silver glitter frosting around lace holes. I don't wear anything else but skechers and these are great for long hikes with the dogs. I would say they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are my most favourite trainers. So comfortable and no blisters . I wear them lots. Best Buy. Prompt delivery and good company to use. I did some research first. You will not be disappointed . Love love love them. Sketchers are by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Skates

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY TRAINERS
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time i have purchased these trainers over the past 3 years because they are simply the best trainers you can buy, excellent fit, quality,lovely cushiony insole that feels divine to walk on with a hard wearing long lasting sole,the price is also excellent i would recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: R.G

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I always had trouble finding trainers I liked and since I tried Sketchers there was no going back. This is a nice pair. Look good, feel good and breathe well. I also like the sparkly bits. Because everyone needs a little sparkle in their step. Not waterproof, but I have boots for the rain...because I'm sensible as well as sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: Sassilee

customer_reviews.title: Try them you wi t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: The Sketchers trainers are absolutely brilliant. They fit well, look smart and are very comfortable. I would recommend them to everyone. Especially those who have trouble walking. I have bad arthritis but try to walk to keep going. These shoes have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Jools64

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love skechers and will buy more than 1 pair if on offer. These I bought for my daughter as her work has a lot of standing and I have told her how comfy they are and for long period of standing or walking and she loves them, this is her 2nd pair,
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P. A. Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 8-9 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself a pair of these in September 2019 and unfortunately already looking for a replacement. The interior lining has worn away on the heel and now is rubbing quite painfully. I'm not a particularly active walker - these were just worn around the office and for the past month out walking the dog. I'm disappointed as these were extremely comfortable and I'm usually quite happy with Skechers, but I'm now finding that any pair of Skechers only lasts less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a condition called plantar fasciitis so it's really hard to find comfortable trainers that I can actually walk in. These are perfect, no pain when I walk or afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: B Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I’d had a pair before and knew they would fit. Had it not been for COVID-19 I would have gone shopping for a pair of proper trainers, not because I want to work out, but because trainers last me several years, whereas Skechers generally only last me a year. Having said that, they are fit for dog Ealing, walking to the shops, and other general use, and can be depended on quality wise. It’s just a shame that the memory foam inner breaks down so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Crane

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam insoles are great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable. Can wear them all day without my feet getting sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of trainers for COMFORT & STYLE
customer_reviews.text: My friend had these trainers and they looked so good and comfortable that I had to get a pair for myself and I'M SO GLAD I DID!! They are hands down the most soft and comfortable trainers I currently own. The inside of the shoe is made out of memory foam so your feet just mould in to them and feel snug. I don't get any problems with pain or fatigue when I walk long distances with these. I also find the design very cute and trendy. Definitely a pair of shoes to consider instead of your go-to Nike or Adidas, not to mention they are much cheaper than a lot of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Ramgopal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing Sketchers for years. Shape-ups were always my favourite but appear to be no longer available so I’ve moved on to d-lites. This was my second pair, as I wanted black pair having previously had an all white. The half sizes available means I can get a perfect fit and this is a bonus for staying with Sketchers. Memory soles are good too and your feet don’t get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not for exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I personally found these trainers a bit "blingy" in appearance. I was hoping for the comfiest footwear as reported by other reviewers, but they seem too chunky for any true exercising, they slip off my ankles(!?) But tightening the laces only makes them constrict my feet. I did keep them, but have hardly worn unfortunately because I can't actually find good use for them!
customer_reviews.author: jildo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: These sketcher trainers never disappoint. Always as size indicates and so comfortable. Excellent if you have arthritic ankles knees or hips.
customer_reviews.author: lucy field

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers for wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great, a little tight to start with but with a little wear they shape to a wider foot. They're a little loose at the back of the ankle/heel but doesn't rub too much and should be fine if laces are tied tight. My only complaint is that a small part of the foam in the back of the trainer has folded or been squashes down, so there's nothing but the outer material there, which was annoying at first but I don't really notice it now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Quickenden

customer_reviews.title: Skechers the most comfortable foot wear ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these have been buying skechers for a long time including these . Happy that this style is being promoted again means they will be on the market for a while., I will be able to buy more to stack away ,hate finding the right shoe and then it disappears already have three pair two being put awzy. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer fizz

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitting Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous trainers, not had these before but always buy Skechers trainers as I have problems with my arch in my foot caused by sciatic nerve issues. Normally buy Skechers E3 premium trainers which I wear my insoles in but struggling to buy them so these are the best alternative so far. Bought for a good price and wish I had been brave and bought more. One very happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: libraherman

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly and fit perfect but one shoe had a 'dip' in the centre of toes that made them uncomfortable after a couple of hours wearing. Would have returned them but I had taken them on holiday and didn't take any others so had no choice but to wear them (taking them off whenever possible). They are now spares.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them !! I have really wide feet so getting a good comfortable fit is near enough impossible. These are perrrrfect ! Adjustable due to the laces, holds the foot really well. Good ankle and heel support and beautiful memory foam under foot. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Chunky style with comfort
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable out of the box, in love with these trainers took a chance I have size 8e feet and these fit like glove. If you have narrow feet they may be too wide will probably purchase more in this style. I think they will be perfect for when the weather is dry and warm. Another plus is they make my feet look smaller
customer_reviews.author: Nikki39

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy arrived on the day for delivery, the trainers are very comfy and you can tell they are not fakes. I'm totally happy and over the moon with these trainers they fit as expected and the material on them are suede very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Soraia3133

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these due to the cushioned insole as I suffer from a slipped disc and osteoarthritis which affects my hips. I have spent a fortune on shoes and insoles. Before I got these I could only walk round one shop before heading home in a lot of pain these have totally improved the pain I managed to walk round Glasgow for the first time in 5yrs pain free highly recommend these trainers if you suffer like me.
customer_reviews.author: Clare O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: i love sketchers on the whole, they were delivered way before expected delivery which was great but this pair seemed a little smaller than the last pair i had which were great as well, it has taken a little time to break them in but now are fine
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Love Skechers and Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size and are very comfortable and they wear well. I love Skechers for the comfort and price and varied styles. Thank you Amazon for deciding to supply Skechers - they were well packaged and arrived safely and on time - thank you Amazon and Skechers!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking the dog
customer_reviews.text: The last trainers wore out the inner fittings within a matter of weeks, the construction of these trainers have proven to be more robust. In addition, they are comfortable and supportive and absorb shocks when walking on hard road surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Flyfisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfection on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Love Skechers so ordered these as soon as I got accepted for a job that involved standing and walking a lot as I knew the were the perfect choice. Although they look big and chunky they are lightweight and very supportive of your feet. Will definitely be ordering another pair in a different colour so I can alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sabatta

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY TRAINERS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these trainers and have bought them many times because they are simply the best quality comfortable trainers ive ever worn( and i go through a least 2 pairs a year) i have a heavy tread and found these trainers lasted me longer than others ive bought, and the price is very reasonable ,i would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: R.G

customer_reviews.title: Great for walkers 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trainers for walking to work, so glad I did as they are the most comfortable trainers I’ve ever bought. Lovely spongy feeling whilst walking whilst being supportive and lightweight. I think come up quite wide but other than that a good fit and do not rub on my heels. Highly recommend these for anyone who does a lot of walking, only had them a week but I think they will be long lasting too, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Skechers as I know if I order the right size they fit perfect. They are very comfortable as have the memory foam to make it comfortable to wear and walk when out and about. When walking they have the cushioning and springy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers, wear them out, not too much these days due to covid, use them for walking the dogs, (have an older pair) Have fibromyalgia and painful feet, find these comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Foley

customer_reviews.title: A good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Totally love these, so comfortable and snug. Will buy in another colour at some point
customer_reviews.author: Jen1967

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic trainers
customer_reviews.text: Like wearing slippers. Size was spot on (6) and look really smart. Haven`t worn them yet but you can tell you would be able to walk miles in comfort. I liked the separate blue laces which I did change and to me look much smarter.
customer_reviews.author: poppy

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: Brought these before from another company and these are again comfortable and great for walking in and doing what ever you would use them for They were cheaper as well from amazon 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely chuffed with these sketchers. Comfy memory foam , light-weight & stylish all in one go. Fab for walking or workout. So glad i purchased them. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I h ad a pair of these ten years ago and thought it was time for some new ones! They are very comfortable and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ooozey

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. I can wear all day without feet hurting. I have had bunions removed , so have odd shaped quite wide feet. Will be ordering another pair as love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Judith G

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I'e got a million pairs of Skechers - so far, these are the best. Incredibly comfortable, supportive, and perfect to help my dodgy achilles tendons. I'm very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: BookEm

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are lovely to wear but I'm a bit gutted that there's a diamanté missing off the tongue, it would be nice for the trainers to be in perfect condition when they arrived. There's also a little mark on the tongue too so I don't think these shoes are the best quality. I bought them for a holiday which I go on Friday so I can't send them back and get a new pair in time 😔
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Louise

customer_reviews.title: not synthetic
customer_reviews.text: This is not a review about the shoes, I didn't wear them and returned. The problem is the description on the Amazon page. It says outer material is synthetic but actually it is made by leather. Being vegetarian, I don't wear leather products.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long walking
customer_reviews.text: Use it several weeks for walking to work (ca. 50 min) - perfect fit, very comfortable for long walking. Hope to wear them all autumn, winter and spring.
customer_reviews.author: O.

customer_reviews.title: good solid base
customer_reviews.text: very comfy shoes- ordered my size , 6 ,and fit was spot on. good solid base, been using for walking daily since had them and no sign of any waring - would recommend and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about 2 months now. They are super comfy and don't hurt my feet like other trainer would. I find them great for walking in but not so good for running.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy indeed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, very slightly bigger than expected which is a bonus for me as I have wide feet, but someone with skinny feet might find their size too big. Perfect foot support and padded soles
customer_reviews.author: H.Lester

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these not to chunky, bought these as I do a lot of walking with my dogs, will update to see if they are as comfy as they feel.
customer_reviews.author: olwen davies

customer_reviews.title: D'lites trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable and we'll fitting trainers I have worn in a long time. I usually buy Skechers because of the memory foam insoles but these are definitely the best so far. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are my go to shoe/trainer. Memory foam in the sole makes for a veey comfortable shoe. I have sore knees and skechers i think help especially walking on hard surfaces. These ones are chunky but look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K.

customer_reviews.title: Smart, Comfortable AND Inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Fab fit and very cheap for Skechers. Extremely comfortable and lightweight. Perfect for those with chronic pain conditions like myself.
customer_reviews.author: HappyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Stylish comfy D’lites are an inexpensive delight
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. So stylish loved the whole buying experience so easy. It was so much cheaper than other Skechers products. Love them so much . Pay day I’m buying a pair for work. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: nicola gardner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainer!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of trainers I’ve ever had...I have wide feet and these fit perfectly and will be ordering a second pair soon!!
customer_reviews.author: hodgy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Slightly too big so I'd recommend ordering a smaller size but they are so comfy, I had surgery on my leg an have a lot of metal which causes pain when walking but these trainers making walking less painful
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable .
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable , feel as if your walking on a cushion . love the look and this is the 2nd pair I've bought . I can use them as a trainer or casual wear .
customer_reviews.author: Julie Betteridge

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers and very comfortable but bulkier than I thought they'd be. Find it hard to walk in them compared to other sketchers I've purshased but that's personal preference. Good buy just not for me
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Good support and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers. Bought after foot surgery, I have a wide foot and these have plenty of room. All my shoes are a UK 7 but thses feel slightly large. Very comfortable. With good sole support
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: comfy but watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: These looked huge and when i looked at the size it says US8. I asked for uk5 which should be size 7 in US. Although they are big I'm hoping they won't stretch and get even bigger. As I've got bad arthritis and plantar fasciitis in my feet I cannot get out to return them, so will have to make do. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Omg these sketches are so so comfortable its untrue. You dont feel like you have trainer on they are so light. We chuffed
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are so comfortable. I work in my feet and need good support and comfort. These trainers are perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They look so cute considering they are chunky. I'm an 8 and I bought a 7 and they fit me fine if not a tiny bit to short but will be fine as they are so wide and I have narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable trainers with memory foam insoles. Comes with a pair of white laces and black laces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers for wide feet, very comfortable good value for money. I'll be using these to get fit and i can see they are going to be fine. Had a little walk out in them earlier and the only downside was your feet can get a bit hot in them. But in all I'd definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, excellent for long shifts at work if your on your feet all day. They also look nice and sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy Robey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 5.5 for a 6 fit as these come up slightly large - Bought as a gift and they are excellent. Recipient loves them so much they've ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Pynnersmeade

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and stylish trainer!!!
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding and beautiful pair of trainers. So stylish. I was in awe. Fits perfectly and very comfortable. Thank -you Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Workout  Diva!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Bought these trainers for my wife as a replacement for her old pair and she loves them, they fit well and look great, I wouldn't buy my wife any other brand but Skechers as she loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traniers
customer_reviews.text: Not that comfortable. Wore twice. Got rid off to a charity shop
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers but unfortunately not wide enough for me. I do have a wider foot but they pinched slightly and so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: bareliz

customer_reviews.title: Walking comfort
customer_reviews.text: Once you've worn Sketchers, nothing else is ever as comfortable again
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Skechers
customer_reviews.text: As described on web site. Vibrant colours, perfect fit. Long laces. Good quality produce. Beautiful.plus comfortable to wear. Stylish, light supportive, laces long enough to be tied.
customer_reviews.author: Rudey.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present for my wife, and she loves them. Would recommend them to anyone. They look smart and are lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Wickham

customer_reviews.title: If you are loving for a bargain trainer that fits you well , then look no further than this product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and fit. Very comfortable to wear. Would not expect any difference because of the maker. Great Value for money. I would recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on air, excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They look great and are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Farley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoe. I'm a 5 and ordered a 5 and it fits perfectly. Great sole, and very comfortable. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: minx

customer_reviews.title: Best Skechers ever
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers are absolutely gorgeous I am so thrilled with them
customer_reviews.author: Tina Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfy ...great to walk in...I am a Sketchers fan now ..
customer_reviews.author: Martin & Cerina

customer_reviews.title: Nothing really they have ticked all my boxes 😎🌊🌊😎
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I have a problem left foot which needs a wider foot and these trainers are just so good. They offer a lot of support to my awkward left foot and it’s like a comfort blanket 😀I😀😀 Sketchers do not disappoint 😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: tulip967

customer_reviews.title: Best Skechers ever bought... ;0)
customer_reviews.text: Best Skechers ever So comfortable and they look great Choice of lace colour included Best buy this year
customer_reviews.author: TLS Design

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Size is perfect. Really comfortable with plenty width. Feet are not squashed like some branded trainers. Very light on the feet too.
customer_reviews.author: H DONALDSON

customer_reviews.title: Fab shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous shoes , love the memory foam Inside and the shoes look brilliant ; love the black and white effect . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Good for long walks
customer_reviews.text: So comfy ... lovely shock absorption memory foam insoles. Even after a 7km walk in these my feet didn't hurt. Not a heavy shoe either. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skechers are great!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, comfy, and look good! I'm a size 6 and bought a size 6, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Megsie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes , looked at them last year couldn’t resist them
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome trainers. Love them! Stylish, comfortable, perfect fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Alina M.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers never let you down
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike arrived as described and are very comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic... :0)
customer_reviews.text: Best Skechers EVER Feel super comfortable and look good Well worth the money True to size
customer_reviews.author: TLS Design

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a present Excellent. Have been told they fit well and a very comfortable they look very trendy
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The comfort
customer_reviews.text: Everyday walking around great don't wear any other make of trainers only Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described including the size
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I've always had sketchers. The sizing is perfect and they are the only brand of trainers I'll buy especially the D'lites
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I thought they looked stylish and comfy and I was right as they look good, great quality material and fit great
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Anne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I just love them! It's like walking on a cloud. They are so comfortable so I often forget to take them off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: neZz

customer_reviews.title: They are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are extremely comfortable, the memory foam allows your feet to feel cushioned whilst walking.

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with very comfortable and to my supervising how light it is very.

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I'm normally a uk size 6 they were too big so my daughter who is a size 7 got a new pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam insole
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam insole. I only wear Skechers trainers as they’re the most comfortable. Used to always wear ASICS but not the same anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were cheaper to buy from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers they are so comfortable.they have memory foam soles.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hitchman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy I’m currently walking around Eindhoven in Holland and I’m very glad I have these on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Shirlie Val

customer_reviews.title: All good but defo not for running
customer_reviews.text: Not at all for running but a great gym show or casual shoe, Mrs says they are super comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Shakira

customer_reviews.title: carfull on sizes
customer_reviews.text: my wifes a size 4 so I ordered a 4. far to big. recommend one size less or half size if available
customer_reviews.author: gordon grear

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about them Comfort height Weight Etc But especially they look so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for exercise
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made in China. No foot support so only good for pretend exercise. Knew this immediately when I saw pathetic glitter detail. Overpriced for essentially a lounge room trainer. Memory foam makes no difference once your weight is in shoe. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all round
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find these anywhere so took to amazon. Great price, quick delivery , genuine item. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, comfy but very clumpy they are like wearing snow shoes. Very bulky trainers and very large fit.
customer_reviews.author: alienfunk

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's D'Lites-Biggest Fan Trainers
product_meta.description: The Skeckers D'Lites Biggest Fan Shoe is a real classic that now offers even more comfort. Sporty casual lace up sneaker with nubuck upper and fabric with decorative stitching and overlay accents. Memory foam insole.
